conclusion: Violation of Art. 5-3;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient;Costs and expenses award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF HUBER v. SWITZERLAND - [Russian Translation]
